lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

Azure.ResourceManager.SystemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

Azure.ResourceManager.TrackedResourceBas.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager tracked top level resource

Azure.ResourceManager.ResourceProvisioni.description: The provisioning state of a resource type.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

deviceResourceIdentifier.description: Azure identifier for the device resource of this registration

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

prefixDeviceName.description: Prefix for the device name to be used when registrating the device

sharedKey.description: Shared key to be expected from devices to send during registration process

registrationUri.description: Registration URI for the devices on this batch to point

maxRegistrationCount.description: Max count of devices to be registered for this registration bulk

registrationCount.description: Count of current devices registered for this registration bulk. Starts in 0

expirationDate.description: Expiration date for his bulk device registration

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

BulkDeviceRegistrationProperties.description: Properties of the bulk device registration

name.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC). Examples: "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/write", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/capture/action"

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for ARM/control-plane operations.

display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; as in Resource Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

actionType.description: Enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

Azure.ResourceManager.Operation.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Resource Provider Operations API

Azure.ResourceManager.createdByType.description: The kind of entity that created the resource.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource.description: Common properties for all ARM resources.

Azure.ResourceManager.ErrorAdditionalInf.description: The resource management error additional info.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

Azure.ResourceManager.OperationDisplay.description: Localized display information for and operation.

Azure.ResourceManager.Origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; as in Resource Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

Azure.ResourceManager.ActionType.description: Enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.
